ExploreFact.Text: I've heard that there's a planet that acts as a hub for the Outer Wilds modding community. Maybe I should visit it first?

RumorFact.Text: Apparently I can find a big party with a bunch of the modders from the community on the north pole.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a big party on the north pole with a bunch of the modders from the community.
I found a series of mod showcases that circle the equator of the planet.
Ernesto says there are 5 showcases: one for popular mods, one for upcoming mods, one for abandoned mods, one for utility mods, and a final one for mod jam entries.
I found a weird computer with a giant, holographic orrery on the south pole.
Apparently I can use the computer to identify and lock on to the different planets throughout the star system, provided I'm in a jam system.
